'''Knights of Favonius''' is a [[soundtrack]] from the album ''[[City of Winds and Idylls]]''.

This soundtrack is featured as a tune contained within [[Radiant Spincrystal 15]].

==Trivia==
* Knights of Favonius features a melody from the soundtrack [[A Day in Mondstadt]].
* This soundtrack is featured in an arrangement titled "[[Mondstadt (Soundtrack)|Mondstadt (Full Concert Version)]]." It was performed by the [https://www.symfonieorkest.be/en/pQbzua/orkest/about-the-orchestra Flanders Symphony Orchestra] in the [[Genshin Concert|Genshin Concert 2021]] event.
